definition: large tough nonrigid bag filled with gas or heated air

positive_examples: This is an example of balloon.
We observed balloon in this context.
A typical case of balloon would involve these features.
The concept of balloon applies here.
A lighter-than-air aircraft that consists of a bag containing heated air or gas lighter than the surrounding atmosphere.
negative_examples: This is an example of helicopter, not balloon.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Helicopter, or other types of Aircraft
